channel.title: More Tracks Pls
channel.description: Idk how many of you have had this issue, but I think a couple more tracks or temp idea tracks should be added. I'm currently finishing up a Billie Eilish remix and I hit track limit about half way through, and its super infuriating having to copy the project and delete certain tracks to try something new to only not like it. Even if 3 more tracks were added, or a system where you could smack down an idea for it to not save, but you have the option to save it (if that makes sense)

item.title: More Tracks Pls
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
maybe depending on what device is being used, it’ll limit the track limit.
Like having a 12 track limit on the 5s and a 32 track limit on the 11

Read full topic

item.title: More Tracks Pls
item.dc:creator: sn.ow.y
item.description:
Even if those CPUs couldn’t run that many tracks, couldn’t this feature be implemented anyways, and then users with older devices would just have to be mindful of how many tracks they’re using?

Read full topic

item.title: More Tracks Pls
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
A lot of people have asked for more tracks, but I think that the CPU’s on some iPhones (A7-A9) aren’t really powerful enough to run many more than thirty or so tracks, and a lot of people here still have those older devices, and they wouldn’t want to ostracize those users. I don’t know if that’s the exact answer, but I think it has something to do with that

Read full topic

item.title: More Tracks Pls
item.dc:creator: iamtheCHiLDiSH
item.description:
Idk how many of you have had this issue, but I think a couple more tracks or temp idea tracks should be added.
I’m currently finishing up a Billie Eilish remix and I hit track limit about half way through, and its super infuriating having to copy the project and delete certain tracks to try something new to only not like it. Even if 3 more tracks were added, or a system where you could smack down an idea for it to not save, but you have the option to save it (if that makes sense)

Read full topic
